lyrics:
Yep, uh-huh
And then it comes to me like an epiphany

It's over
Over
It's over
Over

Second night in a row
You didn't come home
I'm watchin' my phone
Waiting for it to ring, ring, ring

Sittin' in the house on the couch 
With the TV on (On)
All night, all alone ('lone)
Every time same old thing, thing, thing

So I think I'm just about over being your girlfriend
I'm leavin', I'm leavin'
No more wonderin' what you've been doin'
Where you been sleepin'
It's over
I'm leavin'
It's over
I'm leavin', yeah, yeah

So you walked in
(You walked in)
The next mornin'
(The next mornin')
To find me smilin',
Like nothing ever happened

You give me some excuse
(Some excuse)
Like you always do, ooh
(Like you always do)
I just kiss your cheek
And this is what I tell you, you

So I think I'm just about over being your girlfriend
I'm leavin', I'm leavin'
No more wonderin' what you've been doin'
Where you been sleepin'
It's over
I'm leavin'
It's over
I'm leavin', yeah, yeah

How many times did I fall for your lies?
How many times did I sit home and cry?
Never questioning why, why, why, why?
It just came to me
Like an epiphany
How about I just leave-e-e-e?

So I think I'm just about over being your girlfriend
I'm leavin', I'm leavin'
No more wonderin' what you've been doin'
Where you been sleepin'
It's over
I'm leavin'
It's over
I'm leavin', yeah, yeah

So I think I'm just about over being your girlfriend
I'm leavin', I'm leavin'
No more wonderin' what you've been doin'
Where you been sleepin'
It's over
I'm leavin'
It's over
I'm leavin', yeah, yeah
